# Node-Babel-Flow-Jest

Opinionated node boilerplate project

## Editor / Compile / Syntax

-   Visual Studio Code - Recomended extensions added
-   Babel ES2018
-   Flow
-   Eslint
-   Prettier
-   Nodemon

## Modules

-   Express
-   Config
-   Winston
-   Lodash
-   Async

## Testing

-   Jest
-   Chai

## Deployment

-   PM2 - (coming)
-   Docker - Using Dockerfile (coming)
-   Jenkins - Using Jenkinsfile (coming)
